DOC.brief_summary: The purpose trial investigate novel treatment cannabis dependence : cannabidiol . Between 96 168 young people want quit cannabis meet criterion moderate cannabis use disorder ( DSM-5 ) recruit community . Stage one aim identify Most Effective Dose ( MEDmg ) oral cannabidiol reduce cannabis use four treatment week . Stage two determine whether MED identify stage 1 offer effective treatment cannabis dependence .
DOC.brief_title: Cannabidiol : Novel Intervention Cannabis Use Problems ?
